title: Taric
body: Is there any news on Taric and what riot are planning for this antique of a champion

replies.body:
There was a red post about a week ago that they are looking into a gameplay update for him.
Though he needs a visual update more than anything else.
Pls do not change turic gameplay.
If I were them, I would get a gold ring with a big old gem on it. I like it so I'd put a ring on it, what can I say?
